ModMetaData.name: Arkavo Game-RL
ModMetaData.author: Arkavo
ModMetaData.description:
Version 0.5.0
Enables AI agents to observe and control RimWorld colonies through the Game-RL protocol. Connect with Claude Code for natural language colony management.
NEW IN 0.5.0: Shared game-bridge infrastructure, Project Zomboid support added.
SETUP (macOS): 1. Install Claude Code: https://claude.ai/code 2. Load a RimWorld save game 3. Run each line in Terminal: mkdir -p ~/arkavo-rimworld cd ~/arkavo-rimworld claude mcp add game-rl -- "$HOME/Library/Application Support/Steam/steamapps/workshop/content/294100/3634065510/bin/macos/game-rl-server" claude 4. Ask Claude: What's the colony status?
Features: - ColonyManager agent for strategic colony control - Work priority management - Colonist drafting and movement - Forbid/Unforbid items and resources - Medical care settings - Bill management (add, modify, cancel) - Resource and threat observations
